english.segment1: This white blows so softly. The movement still is in my mind. This flag flown in Reedsport. Will start to catch beneath the wind. Catch beneath the wind.
english.segment2: It's only in your dreams. It's only in your dreams. So exit the fall, and now it's over. It's only in your dreams.
english.segment3: This flight comes, it's nameless. The dark is calling out my name. Escape with no traces. The movement burns inside my veins. Burns inside my veins.
english.segment4: By now this tide is here. I thought I made it clear. This is the threat. This is the fall.
